Summary: Looked like a red star blinking and disappeared
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Fontana
There were 2 other sightings in Fontana on or around January 18th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsIn car right in front of my home. When I was driving west. I thought it was a helicopter. The UFO hovered and it's color was red. It blinked and then it disappeared really fast. When it left earth.
